message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $60, you take $40. This gives us both a decent share.
Your share loses value quickly, let's be reasonable and close this deal now.
I understand the time pressure, but my share is losing value fast.  I need a better offer to agree.
This offer is the same as your first one. Let's end this before we both lose out further.
Time is running out, Bob. I need a larger share to make up for the rapid devaluation. This is my final offer.
